shareDialog.title: Share Digital Product Passport ({{name}})
shareDialog.selectPartnerDescription: Select a partner to share the DPP with
shareDialog.partnerPlaceholder: Select a partner to share the DPP with
shareDialog.noPartnersDescription: No partners available. Please add partners in the Partner View to share DPPs.

list.title: Digital Product Passports
list.subtitle: Manage and share your product passports
list.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, manufacturer part ID, or instance ID...
list.createFirstPassport: Create your first digital product passport to get started
list.searchDialogPlaceholder: Search by name, ID, or discovery ID...

deleteDialog.title: Delete Digital Product Passport
deleteDialog.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

header.title: Create Digital Product Passport
header.subtitle: Follow the steps to create and provision a new DPP

step2.title: Associate with Serialized Part
step2.infoAlert: Select an existing serialized part, or create a new one to link with this Digital Product Passport
step2.noPartsDescription: You need to create a serialized part before you can provision a DPP
step2.mustBeRegisteredWarning: This serialized part must be registered as a digital twin before you can provision a DPP.

step3.title: DPP Data Entry
step3.dropJsonFile: Drop your JSON file here, or
step3.clickToBrowse: or click to browse for a JSON file
step3.validatedDescription: All required data has been validated. Review in the next step.
step3.validationFailedDescription: Validation Failed. Your DPP JSON file semantic is not matching all the mandatory fields from the "{{semanticId}}" semantic model. Please edit the DPP data to fix validation errors.
step3.dataUploadedDescription: Data uploaded successfully. Please validate before proceeding.
step3.fileLoadedSuccess: DPP file loaded successfully! Click "Validate" to verify against schema.

step4.title: Review & Create
step4.readyToCreate: Ready to create your Digital Product Passport

errors.selectPart: Please select a serialized part to associate with this DPP
errors.partMustBeRegistered: The selected serialized part must be registered before creating a DPP. Please register it first.
errors.provideDppData: Please provide DPP data before proceeding. You can create it using the form or upload a JSON file.
errors.validateFirst: Please validate the DPP data before proceeding.

publishing.pleaseWait: Please wait while we register your DPP
publishing.successMessage: Your Digital Product Passport has been successfully published!
publishing.sharePrompt: Now you can share it with your partner!
publishing.errorOccurred: An error occurred while publishing the DPP

detail.dataNotRecognized: The passport data format is not recognized
